subject: Bars
Celebrities
Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The Lindell A.C. in Detroit, which closed in 2002, was one of the nation’s first sports bars and one of the last places where professional athletes and other celebrities mingled with fans.
snippet: The Lindell A.C. in Detroit, which closed in 2002, was one of the nation’s first sports bars and one of the last places where professional athletes and other celebrities mingled with fans.
